title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Competencies: Generative AI-Enhanced Humanities Project: Professional Academic

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can analyze philological themes in classical and modern texts using generative AI tools to explain core concepts with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can design and prototype interactive digital content (e.g., conversational scenarios, quiz generation) from literary materials using generative AI platforms.

Learners can establish generative AI application strategies applicable to real-world scenarios (medical/legal/technical fields) and achieve self-efficacy of 4.0/5.0 or higher via self-assessment checklists.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
